attributeDefinition: continous number of plots
individual plot ID
date of biomass harvest
table ID of the greenhouse as block factor
the semi-open greenhouse had walls of glass and of mesh
factor: o = next to the glass wall / c = next to the open mesh wall of the semiopen greenhouse

attributeDefinition: times watered per day
factor: 0.5 = every second day / 1 = every day / 2 = two times per day / 3 = three times per day

attributeDefinition: was it the commercial seed mixture or one of the designed seed mixtures
factor: Standard = standard commercial mixture / Vigorous / Robust / Intermediate = all are designed seed mixtures

attributeDefinition: weight of seeds per square meter
ID of substrate mixture which includes brickType and brickRatio and acid
were the crushed bricks clean or from demolitions with adjacend mortar and render
factor: Clean = clean bricks from the factory / Demolition = bricks from demolitions

attributeDefinition: ratio of bricks within the total substrate
were the crushed bricks treated with phosphoric acid?
factor: Acid = treatment with acid / Control = no treatment

attributeDefinition: biomass of grass species
biomass of forb species
calculated vegetation cover with imageJ 4 weeks after seeding
calculated vegetation cover with imageJ 6 weeks after seeding
calculated vegetation cover with imageJ 8 weeks after seeding
calculated vegetation cover with imageJ 10 weeks after seeding
calculated vegetation cover with imageJ 11 weeks after seeding
calculated vegetation cover with imageJ 13 weeks after seeding
number of species which were not in the seed mixture
number of species which were sown and germinated
number of species which were sown but did not germinate
specPres / (specPres + specAbs)
